description: Up through descending vegetation, desert-like with sagebrush. Exit point of trail pretty close to start point.
directions:
Follow GPS to first point on track, park there.
About 1/2 way between Denver & Fruita lies Eagle, CO.  Take exit 147, go South into town and find Bellyache Road (I'm serious).  Follow it just under 1 mile to a switchback & look for the parking area.
title: Boneyard to East Eagle
